[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@stabilio/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.md)

## EthersStabilio class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EthersStabilio implements ReadableEthersStabilio, TransactableStabilio 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabilio.md)<!-- -->, [TransactableStabilio](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EthersStabilio` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.connection.md) |  | [EthersStabilioConnection](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnection.md) | Information about the connection to the Stabilio protocol. |
|  [populate](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.populate.md) |  | [PopulatableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.populatableethersstabilio.md) | Can be used to create populated (unsigned) transactions. |
|  [send](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.send.md) |  | [SendableEthersStabilio](./lib-ethers.sendableethersstabilio.md) | Can be used to send transactions without waiting for them to be mined. |
